nl.weeaboo.vn.scene

Interface IVisualElement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDestructible, IInputHandler, ISignalHandler, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAxisAlignedContainer, IButton, IDrawable, IGridPanel, IImageDrawable, ILayer, IPanel, ITextDrawable, ITransformable, IViewport, IVisualGroup

    public interface IVisualElement
extends java.io.Serializable, IDestructible, ISignalHandler, IInputHandler
    Renderable element.

    • Method Detail

      • addSignalHandler

        <T extends ISignalHandler & java.io.Serializable> void addSignalHandler(int order,
                                                                        T handler)
        Appends a new signal handler.
        Parameters:
        order - Handlers are called in ascending order whenever a signal is received.

      • removeSignalHandler

        void removeSignalHandler(ISignalHandler handler)
        Removes the first occurrence of the given signal handler

      • draw

        void draw(IDrawBuffer drawBuffer)
        Draws all visible items into the supplied draw buffer.

      • getParent

        @Nullable
IVisualGroup getParent()
        Returns:
        The parent of this element in the view hierarchy. For example, a ILayer.

      • setParent

        void setParent(@Nullable
               IVisualGroup parent)
        Attaches this element to the given parent.

        If the parent is null, this element becomes detached from the view hierarchy. Detached elements no longer receive signals.

        Parameters:
        parent - May be null.

      • getZ

        short getZ()
        Returns:
        The relative rendering order of this element. Elements with lower Z-values are rendered on top of elements with higher Z-values.

      • isVisible

        boolean isVisible()
        Returns:
        true if this element should be rendered.

      • getVisualBounds

        nl.weeaboo.common.Rect2D getVisualBounds()
        Returns:
        The axis-aligned bounding box for this visual element, relative to the origin of its parent.

      • getRenderEnv

        @Nullable
IRenderEnv getRenderEnv()
        Returns information about the rendering environment.

      • getLayoutAdapter

        ILayoutElem getLayoutAdapter()
        Returns:
        The interface used to access this visual element's layout properties.
